1.question: What is the setup time and data security?

0.question: What is micro content?
0.answer: Micro content is short, focused training modules (2-5 minutes) designed for just-in-time learning. Improves completion rates and engagement compared to long-form training.

1.question: How does segmentation work?
1.answer: Segmentation allows you to assign different training content to different user groups based on role, department, risk level, or custom attributes. Ensures right content to right learners.

2.question: Can we customize certificates?
2.answer: Yes. Certificate templates are fully customizable. Add your branding, format, and specific information. Certificates generate automatically upon completion.

3.question: What LMS platforms are supported?
3.answer: Phishy integrates with major LMS platforms including Cornerstone, Workday, SAP SuccessFactors, Moodle, and more. Custom integrations available.

4.question: How is training effectiveness measured?
4.answer: Effectiveness is measured through completion rates, improvement scores, engagement metrics, and behavior change. Reports show training impact over time.

cta.description: Let's schedule your live demo. See how automated training tracking improves completion rates and engagement.

SolutionsCyberAwareness.title: Increasing Cyber Awareness

hero.title: Increasing Cyber Awareness
hero.subtitle: Build stronger security awareness across your organization

problems.title: The Challenge
problems.description: Organizations face significant challenges when it comes to building and maintaining strong cyber awareness.

items.title: Employee Awareness Gaps
items.description: Employees lack sufficient knowledge about recognizing and protecting against cybersecurity threats.

items.title: Difficulty Measuring Awareness
items.description: It's challenging to measure current awareness levels and identify areas for improvement.

items.title: Lack of Systematic Training
items.description: Without a regular and systematic training approach, it's difficult to increase awareness levels.

items.title: Reactive Approach
items.description: A reactive rather than proactive approach requires intervention after problems arise.

solutions.title: How Phishy Helps
solutions.description: Phishy provides comprehensive tools and solutions to build and measure cyber awareness effectively.

items.title: Phishing Simulations
items.description: Test your employees' awareness levels and identify weak points with realistic phishing simulations.

items.title: Training Modules and Micro-Learning
items.description: Drive behavior change with 2-minute gamified trainings. Provide instant learning opportunities after risky behaviors with automated follow-up training.

items.title: Real-Time Awareness Metrics
items.description: Monitor and measure awareness scores, click rates, and improvement areas in real-time.

items.title: Automated Follow-Up Training
items.description: Enable continuous improvement by automatically sending micro-learning content after risky behaviors.

benefits.title: What You Get
benefits.description: Measurable outcomes and benefits from using Phishy for cyber awareness.

items.title: Improved Awareness Scores
items.description: See measurable improvements in awareness scores with regular simulations and training.

items.title: Reduced Click Rates
items.description: Record significant decreases in click rates on phishing emails.

items.title: Better Incident Reporting
items.description: Employees report suspicious emails faster and more frequently.

items.title: Measurable ROI
items.description: Measure and report return on investment with clear metrics.

useCases.title: Real-World Use Cases
useCases.description: See how organizations use Phishy to increase cyber awareness in different scenarios.

items.title: Compliance-Driven Training

SolutionsPhishingIncidents.description: Respond to and manage phishing threats effectively with Phishy. Streamline incident management with unified inbox, automated playbooks, and real-time threat intelligence.

hero.title: Managing Phishing Incidents
hero.subtitle: Respond to and manage phishing threats effectively

problems.title: The Challenge
problems.description: Managing phishing incidents effectively requires the right tools and processes.

items.title: Slow Incident Response Times
items.description: When response times to incidents are long, damage increases and security risk rises.

items.title: Difficulty Tracking and Managing Incidents
items.description: Tracking, prioritizing, and managing numerous incidents is complex and time-consuming.

items.title: Lack of Automation
items.description: Manual processes increase error risk and extend response times.

items.title: Poor Threat Visibility
items.description: Lack of visibility into the threat landscape makes it difficult to take proactive measures.

solutions.title: How Phishy Helps
solutions.description: Phishy provides comprehensive incident management tools to respond to and manage phishing threats effectively.

items.title: Unified Incident Management Inbox
items.description: Collect, prioritize, and manage all phishing incidents in one central location. Single view for all incidents.

items.title: Automated Playbooks and Workflows
items.description: Create automated playbooks for common scenarios. Incidents are automatically routed to the right workflow.

items.title: Real-Time Threat Intelligence
items.description: Take proactive measures with current threat intelligence. Monitor and analyze threat trends.

items.title: Post-Incident Analysis and Insights
items.description: Perform detailed post-incident analysis, identify improvement areas, and prevent future incidents.

benefits.title: What You Get
benefits.description: Measurable outcomes and benefits from using Phishy for incident management.

items.title: Faster Response Times
items.description: Significantly reduce response times to incidents with automation and centralized management.

items.title: Better Incident Tracking
items.description: Track all incidents in one central location and monitor their status in real-time.

items.title: Automated Remediation
items.description: Reduce the need for manual intervention with automated remediation processes for common scenarios.

items.title: Improved Security Posture
items.description: Improve your overall security posture with proactive measures and rapid response.

useCases.title: Real-World Use Cases
useCases.description: See how organizations use Phishy to manage phishing incidents effectively.

items.title: Automated Incident Response
items.description: Create automated playbooks for common phishing scenarios and automatically resolve incidents.

items.title: Threat Intelligence Integration
items.description: Integrate with external threat intelligence sources and take proactive measures.

items.title: Compliance Reporting
items.description: Document and report your incident management processes in compliance with regulatory requirements.

Hero.title: Phishing Simulation
Hero.subtitle: Real-World Defense
Hero.description: This product is designed to enhance companies' cybersecurity. Prepare your team for real-world threats with advanced simulation tools.

Prepare.title: Prepare Simulations
Prepare.description: Create professional phishing simulations quickly and easily. Use drag-and-drop interfaces, custom branding, and real website content to build realistic training scenarios.

RunSimulations.title: Run Simulations
RunSimulations.subtitle: Launch campaigns and track them in real-time

liveMonitoring.title: Live Campaign Monitoring
liveMonitoring.description: Launch campaigns and monitor live data as your team responds. Get real-time insights into how your employees interact with simulated phishing attempts, allowing you to identify vulnerabilities and improve security awareness immediately.
liveMonitoring.longDescription: Our live monitoring system provides comprehensive visibility into campaign performance. Track email opens, link clicks, and user responses in real-time. Receive instant notifications when users engage with simulated threats, enabling quick intervention and immediate training opportunities. Monitor multiple campaigns simultaneously with our intuitive dashboard that displays key metrics, response rates, and engagement patterns.

interactionTracking.title: Click and Interaction Tracking
interactionTracking.description: See which users clicked on links and shared information. Gain detailed insights into user behavior patterns and identify which types of phishing attempts are most effective in your organization.
interactionTracking.longDescription: Comprehensive tracking of every user interaction with your simulated phishing campaigns. Monitor link clicks, form submissions, and data entry patterns. Understand the complete user journey from initial email receipt to final interaction. Identify high-risk behaviors and vulnerable departments that require additional training. Export detailed reports showing interaction timelines, click-through rates, and user engagement metrics.

fileTracking.title: File Download Tracking
fileTracking.description: Track downloads and file openings for each team member. Monitor when users download attachments from phishing emails and which files they open, providing critical insights into security awareness levels.
fileTracking.longDescription: Advanced file tracking capabilities that monitor every download and file interaction from simulated phishing campaigns. Track which attachments users download, when they open files, and how they interact with malicious content. Identify employees who frequently download suspicious attachments and require immediate security training. Receive alerts when users interact with potentially dangerous file types, enabling rapid response and education.

statistics.title: Campaign Statistics
statistics.description: View comprehensive statistics of users who stopped phishing campaigns. Analyze success rates, identify trends, and measure the effectiveness of your security training programs over time.
statistics.longDescription: Powerful analytics dashboard that provides deep insights into campaign performance and user behavior. Track success rates, identify trends, and measure the effectiveness of your security training programs. Compare performance across different departments, campaigns, and time periods. Generate detailed reports showing improvement metrics, vulnerability patterns, and training impact. Use data-driven insights to optimize your phishing simulation strategy and enhance organizational security.

analytics.title: Email Engagement Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed reports on opened emails, clicked links, and entered data to measure campaign effectiveness.

incident.title: Incident Reporting Effectiveness
incident.description: Measure the effectiveness of your team's incident reporting process and file activity tracking.
